title: Up-converting β-NaY0.8[Yb0.18Er0.02]F4 nanoparticles coated by superparamagnetic γ-Fe2O3 nanosatellites: elaboration, characterization and in vitro cytotoxicity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31486-31497
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00909F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
M. Parvizian, W. Mnasri, M. Pleckaitis, V. Karabanovas, H. Khan, S. Nowak, S. Gam-Derouich, L. Ben Tahar, O. Sandre, R. Rotomskis, S. Ammar
100 nm sized up-converting β-NaY0.8[Yb0.18Er0.02]F4 cores were decorated with 10 nm sized superparamagnetic g-Fe2O3 nanosatellites forming valuable probes for bimodal optical and magnetic imaging, without inducing acute toxicity on mammalian cells.
